name: v1_dadjokes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dad_jokes_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Thousands of hilarious dad jokes for your entertainment apps. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/dadjokes
API description: Fetch one or more random dad jokes from the API Ninjas Dad Jokes API endpoint.

limit.description: The number of jokes to return. Must be a string representing a number between 1 and 10. Default is None.
